description: Try our easy to follow Vegetarian Mushroom & Green Bean Stir Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetarian Mushroom & Green Bean Stir Fry
name: Vegetarian Mushroom & Green Bean Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs Lee Kum Kee gluten free soy sauce
0.5 tsp Lee Kum Kee pure sesame oil
200 g Jade Phoenix Ingredients Mushroom Dried Whole Shiitake

recipeInstructions.text: Add another 1/3 tbs oil to the pan or wok. Add shiitake mushrooms and cook, stir occasionally for 3-4 mins until slightly browned. Reduce to medium heat, add minced garlic and minced ginger, and stir-fry for 20 secs. Return the beans to the wok and add the sauce mix. Toss and cook until the sauce thickens slightly, and the vegetables are evenly coated
